name: holiday-particle-tree
description: Interactive Holiday Particle Tree with hand gesture controls

scripts.prebuild: if exist build rd /s /q build && mkdir build && copy index.html build\ && if exist README.md copy README.md build\ && if exist media xcopy /E /I media build\media && if exist scripts xcopy /E /I scripts build\scripts && echo node_modules> build\.gitignore && echo. > build\.nojekyll
scripts.deploy: npm run prebuild && npm run build && npx gh-pages -d build --dotfiles
